title: Nintendo Switch emulator suyu continues on from yuzu - first release is up
description: There's a new Nintendo Switch emulator named suyu, which has been forked off from the original yuzu before Nintendo shut it down and a release is now available.

title: GNOME 46 is out now with experimental variable refresh rate (VRR) support
description: The release many GNOME fans have been waiting for is here and it's looking really fancy. GNOME 46 available now brings on experimental variable refresh rate (VRR) support. There's masses more of course!

title: Funselektor (art of rally) and Strelka Games (Hell is Others) announce Golden Lap
description: Golden Lap is a new minimalistic racing strategy game announced by the developers Funselektor (art of rally) and Strelka Games (Hell is Others).

title: DXVK version 2.3.1 released with more efficient shader code generation on NVIDIA GPUs
description: The Vulkan-based translation layer for Direct3D 9/10/11 used for Wine and Proton has a new release out, and it sounds like a good one if you're an NVIDIA GPU user on Linux.

title: Respawn release statement and update on the Apex Legends hacking situation
description: Recently I reported on Apex Legends pro players getting hacked during the Global Series tournament, and now the developer Respawn Entertainment has released a small statement.

title: Stardew Valley 1.6 is out now - player count on Steam explodes
description: ConcernedApe has released the huge Stardew Valley 1.6 update now, and it's absolutely crammed full of new content. Time to get farming again?
